name: The things we see!
description:
Fleeing the city, Eric May experiences a bizarre scene in the countryside that begins with the scream of an unknown girl.

The game is still a work in progress, but is playable until a certain point. My plan is to publish the full story someday. 

If you like the story, please consider donating, it will help me finish the story faster. Also leave a comment or rating, it can help shape a better story.

Here’s some things that are coming on the horizon:

  • audio improvements
  • more branching story
  • three distinct endings

Made by: Zvonimir Kucis
